## SSXClientSession type

Representation of an active SSXSession.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare type SSXClientSession = {
    address: string;
    walletAddress: string;
    chainId: number;
    sessionKey: string;
    siwe: string;
    signature: string;
    ens?: SSXEnsData;
};
```
<b>References:</b> [SSXEnsData](./ssx.ssxensdata.md)
